titleStmt.title: The anatomy of the separatists, alias, Brownists the factious brethren in these times, wherein this seditious sect is fairely dissected, and perspicuously discovered to the view of world : with the strange hub-bub, and formerly unheard of hurly-burly, which those phanatick and fantastick schismatiks made on Sunday ... the 8 of May ... at the sermon of the Right Rev. Father in God, Henry, Bishop of Chichester ...
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

Father in God, Henry, Bishop of Chichester ...

notesStmt.note: Item at reel 196:1 and 265:E238, no. 14 identified as T427 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
